room_title: Escape room "CSI" by The Escape Works in Watertown
room_description:
“The Family” has made you an offer you can’t refuse.

You’re an experienced lead CSI agent with mob ties you thought you’d escaped. But no one ever really leaves “The Family” behind.

When their beloved patriarch turned up dead, they called the police — but “The Family” doesn’t trust cops. You, on the other hand?

Your experience interpreting complex crime scenes is legendary; you have a team of experienced investigators at your disposal; and when your “godfather” calls you in the middle of the night, well, you must respond — or else.
